message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. After careful consideration, we are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations.
Alice, thank you for the offer and for explaining the value of this product. I'm very interested but $950,000 is a bit outside my budget. Would you consider a price closer to $600,000?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We understand your current budget constraints, and we're glad to work with you towards a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on your feedback, we are proposing a revised price of $750,000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise while still reflecting the value and quality of the item. Please let us know if this revised offer aligns better with your financial considerations.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $750,000 is closer, but still a little high for me. Could we meet in the middle somewhere, perhaps around $675,000?

Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product and for considering our previous proposals. In light of your latest offer, we are pleased to counter with a price of $700,000. We believe this reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budgetary constraints. We hope this proposal will facilitate a successful transaction.
